summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving through an intersection. A white sedan is seen moving from the left side of the frame towards the center, eventually cutting into the lane of the observer vehicle. The sedan continues to move ahead, and a person on a scooter appears from the right side of the frame, moving towards the center of the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while approaching the intersection. The white sedan cuts into the lane from the left side, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate slightly to avoid collision. The vehicle continues to monitor the sedans movement and the scooter appearing from the right side.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, moving towards the center and cutting into the lane. 2) Right side: A person on a scooter, approximately 10 meters away, moving towards the center of the road.
